text.text_translated:
At her old job, Gabriela worked in a high power distance culture. In this culture, workers respected their leaders. Leaders had a lot of power and made the big decisions. Workers did not often question them.
But Gabriela's new team in Sweden is different. They work in a low power distance culture. Here, workers and bosses often work together. They find answers and make decisions together. Leaders are like coaches. They want workers to think for themselves. They think it is good when workers question their ideas.
